abstract: Cameron Carling, 38, left to pursue a dream life in Costa Rica. Then he quit that, too.
lead_paragraph: I moved to New York in 2007 from Los Angeles, where I had been living after college at U.C.L.A. You show up in New York for a week in September, and youâ€™re like, This is the most magical goddamned place on the planet. This is where all of the things are happening in the world.
